list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: move to or place in a particular position.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I put my hand out toward her
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đưa tay về phía cô ấy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: bring into a particular state or condition.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they tried to put me at ease
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Họ đã cố gắng để tôi thoải mái

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: throw (a shot or weight) as an athletic sport.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she set a women's record by putting the shot 56' 7"
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô đặt kỷ lục của phụ nữ bằng cách đưa cú sút 56 '7 "
